Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the extension of the Village Alliance business improvement district.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Extension of the Village Alliance business improvement district.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Resolution endorsing the Speaker’s decision to file, on behalf of the Council, an amicus brief in support of Suffolk County in the litigation between the Retail Industry Leaders Association ("RILA") and Suffolk County for the purpose of supporting the City’s Health Care Security Act (Local Law number 89 for the year 2005 and Local Law 1 for the year 2006).
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Resolution endorsing the Speaker’s decision to file, on behalf of the Council, an amicus brief in support of Suffolk County in the litigation between the Retail Industry Leaders Association ("RILA").

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the extension of the Village Alliance business improvement district.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Extension of the Village Alliance business improvement district.

Items.Title: Resolution endorsing the Speaker’s decision to file, on behalf of the Council, an amicus brief in support of Suffolk County in the litigation between the Retail Industry Leaders Association ("RILA") and Suffolk County for the purpose of supporting the City’s Health Care Security Act (Local Law number 89 for the year 2005 and Local Law 1 for the year 2006).
